### Head First Statistics

***

#### 1. Visualizing Information
A tale of two charts
```{r}
profit <- c(2.0, 2.1, 2.2, 2.1, 2.3, 2.4)
month <- c(7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12)
profitbyMonth <- data.frame(month, profit)
```
```{r}
plot(profitbyMonth$profit~profitbyMonth$month,
   type="l",
   main="Company Profit per Month",
   xlab="Month",
   ylab="Profit(millions of dollars)",
   col="blue")
```
